This is a hosties map suited for either fun games of simon, jumprope, roulette, musical chairs, red light green light, melon racing or basketgun. Have fun!

there are 3 secrets in this map so

Well, i alway's enjoyed playing the orignal map so i decided to fix some of the old problems, and add some new feature's.

you can no longer fall off the map.

you no longer get stuck in S4S, (added a button inside.)

the t spawn door now opens with no problem's.

i've changed the ct spawn around a little bit also.

there's a new rebel's tunnel so you dont have to camp the red room.

that's about it. let me know what you guy's think.

This is a re-tex of hosties_snt(v1).

It includes a T spawn with optional rebel way and a CT controlled door, slotted wall for improved monitoring and stricter rules, gun toss, shot for shot, spray and four jails - In addition there can be found probably the best race in the hosties history!

Enjoy the map, atleast we did while testing :)
Omena,

This map is especially made for the Hosties Mod, wich (so sad) is not yet a mod...
This map is a total conversion of that famous zombie map you may recognise!

-The second screenshot shows you the metal detector, this tool is made for the CT's, everytime a player passes under the metaldetector, he loses all his guns and recieves only a knife...
This is made in order to make the CT's job easier in stead of always checking the T's if they have guns...
However, the T's can still rebel by avoiding this metal detector and keep their gun with them!

-The last screenshot shows you the jail cells, this is made to prison the T's so the CT's can proceed their main task of finding and jailing every T in the map... The jail is fully provided with toilets, if the T needs to drop some brown packages, he is able to! And of course the bed to lay down and rest a bit to recharge their power and mind... The jail isn't a trap for life, there is a way to get out (if you have a knife) of the jail and avoid the CT's... This way IS AGAINST THE RULES of the CT's and you CAN be shot for this...

-Extra about the jail cells: in the basement there is a button who controls every door, if you push the button, all jail doors open... And every 1 minute, 2 jail door randomly open due a crash in the jail main program...

This is my map... Enjoy
A Zombie version of this map is on it's way!!!
A Fight Yard version of this map is on it's way!!!
A map based around the game mode "hosties".

The map contains four mini games. I thought adding the mini games would allow for faster and funner ways of elimination. The map took me a while to make. Hope it cuts for a hosties and hope you'll enjoy. Please leave some feedback on the map. It is a beta version, though I have tested it countless times with my brothers help. There are 22 spawn points. 10 CT's and 12 T's


**COMMENT PLEASE. WOULD HELP**

A hosties map based in the sky, a lot of this maps theme came from the Cairo Arcology from Deus Ex 2 Invisible War. Getting outside of this map has been tried and tested and you can't get out unless you noclip. There is a secret way to get to on top of the entire map via a hidden teleport and only one(1) player can go up there and pick up a few weapons.

2 versions of gun toss, a normal version and a bucket version with no rules, so make you own on the fly.

Arena floating in the middle for knife and chicken fights.

Shot for shot opposite of the gun toss areas. 

4 jail cells located near a one-way wall next to the T spawn.

m4's located in front of CT spawn, well away from T's, but still a danger if they aren't watched.

This map sponsored by intox. Gaming, visit us at intoxgaming.com!

Enjoy!

**UPDATED FILE WITH v3, SOME MINOR GRAPHICAL IMPROVEMENTS, CLIPPING ERRORS FIXED, REMOVED m4's FROM CT SPAWN.

* Updated to v2!

This is another hosties map based upon my sky theme. Has the all the basic hosties needs:

- 3 jail cells
- Gun toss
- Shot for shot (2 platforms over looking the whole map)
- 1-way wall for simon-says and other such games
- Arena for chicken and knife fights (hanging between SFS platforms)
- Secondary escape route for rebels

I also added a raceway with multiple obstacles to overcome for some added challenges. 

Unlike my other maps, this map has no secret area or any other type of Easter Egg to find. 

This map sponsored by intox. Gaming, come show your love and support at www.intoxGaming.com

Extract to your map folder
C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\(username)\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

This is a basic hosties map where Ts start in a building and CTs start outside surrounding the building. Ts can either comply with the CTs and exit through the main door, or take the escape route on the roof and rebel against the CTs.

*Hint, you can shoot thru walls

Update {BETA 2}
-Added props to jail
-Added ladder to pit, and increased walls on sides
-Fixed some other bugs
-Fixed slot ammount bug

VERSION 1 NOTES Hello, this is my third hosties map I have made. It has a winter-themed textures so I named it hosties_siberia, I was thinking of to add trees to the background, but didn't think that was necessary. You can find shot for shot and gun toss from the map, and the pit is tricky, its deep and underwater, if the T choose to get their weapons back, they might lose some health on the run. :) I hope you enjoy playing the map. Constructive criticism is welcome, but don't bother opening your mouth if all you can say is flaming. Omena, EDIT: We have just played 20 minutes on the map and it has been a great success! The pit is funny, a deathtrap, good for chicken fight, rofl. There is the ultimate rebel hide in the map, when you find it, you'll camp it for the rest of your life. Lol! Everyone on the server seemed to like the map and graded it 9+. VERSION 3 FEATURES - Improved and modified lights - Control Tower - Pit Ladder - Ski Hut - Underground Tunnel - 3 Teleports - Doors now work properly - New Sky I hope you enjoy the new version, Omena :) The map can be found here! 66.150.155.213:27015

my map has many features such as:

s4s FIXED

Nothing fancy this time guys, just attempted to ease the CTs work and make rebelling more difficult.

The CT have straight view to the T spawn through a glass wall, preventing to neutralize any threats.
The T can be asked to drop their weapons to the bin on checkout before the CT opens the door for the T.

The CT has various spots to camp and a teleport from spawn to the "wall" so there can be someone waiting for the T to arrive.

Everything is surrounded by a double-fence which over you cannot jump and the door raises very slowly so the T have to stay friendly towards the CT because the only way out is in a body bag.

When the T manages to get out, you will find the basic two minigames inside, shot for shot and gun toss.

Enjoy the map, and I hope there won't be so much rebelling this time,
Omena,


The map can be found here!

MAP MADE BY: Westsid3r
**********************
*Thanks to Cookie.Ferdinand for the idea to make a map that looks like a cookie. I tried my best!*

Spawns: 32 (16 t, 16 ct)
Jails: 2 jails, 2 net traps that could be used as small jails, 1 milk glass (jail)
Shot4shot? yes
Gun toss? yes
Race? no
Arena? no

Includes:
*The terrorists spawn in the spaceship, which crashes on the planet cookie.
*After the crash, a hole will be made in the wall (rebel way)
*There are UFOs flying around the map, some of them will pick you up and give you a ride
*2 net traps, will close when touching/pressing/shooting the stick
*A launcher which sends you very far up in the air, surely breaks your bones
*Milk glass, works as jail

PICTURES
1. View from simon wall
2. View from above
3. View from a spinning tower thingie
4. View from behind simon wall
5. The launcher, enter it to be launched real far up in the air (a trap)
6. The map

Special thanks to:
EastSider, for pakratting the map and for support
karatek√§fer, for his awesome skybox

Heres a video that shows how the map looks like:
NOTE: the skybox is unchanged there since the vid is old

I continued working on my beta1 map and this is the result! Lighting, background sound, new Last Requests and much more has been added! The Last Requests on this map are: - GunToss - JumpShot - Shot4Shot - SprayContest - Knive Arena - Chicken Fight - Chances - Bomb Plant - Basketball: 3 tries, most goals wins - Dices: Highest wins - Dices: Higher/Lower - Roulette: 3/16 chance to die I personally think this looks pretty good, but if you disagree and/or have tips, tricks, bug reports or anything else to say to me about this map, please comment! It only takes 30 seconds and you help me out allot! Your feedback is much appreciated. Updated: I removed a small bug with the Dices and added a ladder to get out of the pit!

//Pimp Juice

This is a hosties map that starts with all of the terrorists in jail cells and the counter-terrorists in a lounge room.  The terrorists can break the vents in the back of the cells (although not all break) to go to the rebel area below (boxes and busted out cell area) which is lit red to designate it as the rebel area.  The CT's have to press the universal unlock button in the controll room (middle raised button that sounds 3 buzzers when pressed).  The cells can then be opened individually or 5 at a time in the control room.

There is an inspection wall next to the cell area which can be raised and lowered by a button on a catwalk above.  There is also a fenced area next to the control room to corral the T's or an "arena" to play various games in like chicken fighting.

The last request games built into the map are: Gun toss, shot for shot, knife fight (arena), chicken fight (arena), and race.  The race starts with one person getting on the bottom of the race area (the boxes by arena) where the red arrows point the way to go, lining up at the edge of the box.  The person on the bottom presses the button which activates a random timer for a bell to start the race.  Press the button at the end to finish and the person with the green light wins the race.

This map is intuitively set up to allow the T's to rebel and also not give any standoff points through one-way walls for very long.  There are different hidden weapons in different parts of the map.

Suggested players: 12+

Hosties_paradigm_final By Freekheid

This map is a new paradigm in hosties gaming for CSS. It contains two new stunningly fun game elements that can be played in stead of evil simon:

Red Light, Green Light: Get to the wall as fast as possible when the light is green. When it turns red (by hands of the ct) freeze! If someone moves while it's red light, they die. Last one at the wall dies.

Musical Chairs: When the music stops playing, T's have to get their hands on a seat, the one that doesn't, dies... Seat numbers become less when the group is lessened.

Other basic hosties material:
-Guntoss
-Shot 4 shot
-Simon Wall
-Secret Way
-Race
-Mantoss (new)
-Jails 2x
-Gas Chambre

A band of outlaws have been found to be hiding in a bar in a old mining town. On a cold, dark and windy morning the sherifs and deputies have the task bestowed on them to either put the rebeling outlaws to their just end or to uphold order in the small abandoned township.

All I can think of to say is I made this map, due to the idea of other edited maps like hosties_panic3. I wanted to edit that map, but then i thought, to many people edited that map, so i edited this map, seeing how i haven't seen any1 edit it yet.

First Time Making a hosties map ^^

Basically Used a lot of custom textures so the they have been credited on my authors title.

Map is basically about prisoners being taken to a offworld location which is for life,


MAP FEATURES

- Tram to escape as an secret way round the location
- Use the towers for s4s
- Underground bunker to play gun toss
- Fail Chute for those who fail the guntoss
- High Quility Jails
- Custom Music
- Custom Skybox
- Custom walls/decals
- Lots of displacements
- A solid fame rate of 120 minimun
- "Alert Stage" If Terroists take the alternative escape
- Towers to look out with spotlights.

MAP MADE BY: Westsid3r
**********************'
Map info: NEW V5 VERSION OUT

Spawns: 32
Jails: 5 small jails, 1 big jail, 1 truck jail, 1 blood room jail, 1 dark jail, 1 hatch (for those who dont behave )
Shoot4shoot? yes
Gun toss? yes
Race? yes
Arena? Yes for knife and chicken fights, can also be used as a jail

**More info: V2
Map was updated for i3d.net from 24 players to 32!
A new way to the LR games has been made, a new alley that can be accessed from the vent in the new basement office area. 2 new jails have also been made.

***More info: V3
Map has been updated (Total time: 4hours)
*Biggest goal was to balance the map
*A watchtower has been added
*A secret hall way
*Doors have been adjusted, so they dont kill when blocked.
*Some small tweaks

****More info: V4
Map has been updated, again (Total time: 5 hours)
*The biggest goal ever was to balance the map
*New Simon says wall + the SSB
*CT's can now open the secret alley door, means that it can be opened with a simple "USE" press
*Some extended CT camp area
*Another Terrorist rebel way
*Some minor changes

*****More info: V5 (Long time)

*New rebel way - 1 or 2 T can use it, depends on teamwork
*New CT camp spots
*Watchtower texture changed
*Some secret places
*New jail
*Thanks to unknown player who found the glitch
*Jails changed - they close themselves after 4sec
*Some other small changes


PICTURES
1. View from above
2. View from behind simon wall
3. Office (T spawn)
4. New inside building action
5. Alley
6. The new rebel way

Special thanks to¬¥:
Scytha, for the police car prefab. - http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/231
Mr-Raptor, for the office prefab - http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/2240
EastSider and i3d.net, for support.

NOTE:
The police carprefab is original by Scytha.
I changed Raptors office because it was too small, I changed the size of it, twisted the desks and chairs around, made an head office, made toilets and basement + rebel ways.

Update: 16-4-09 - Removed the hatches at the race - they would bug when the button was pressed. Added an elevator instead. - Added fences to the shot 4 shot fields.
Update: 16-4-09 - Spawn doors do not open when touched anymore. - The top of the ladders that you use to get up the wooden platforms at the spawn are now not solid anymore, so you will not get stuck behind them.
It's a regular hosties map. It's an enclosed area. Terrorists have the option to take a secret way from the spawn. The ct's can control where they go etc. There's a Gun Toss, Race, Shot for Shot and knife/chicken fight arena. There are also "random death cells". Enjoy :).

Credits:

1. Westsider for teaching me the basics.
2. Sunshine for teaching me compiling and further basics.
3. Reflax for letting me "steal" jails and the GT ramp from him, also giving me a lesson in Hammer.
4. Eastsider for the "finishing touch" brushes and choice of texture.
5. Doomsknight for solving my compiling problem!
6. Thank you I3D!
7. Thank you YouTube!
Please do not mock me or say this map is bad. It is my first map and I think it is pretty good.
